verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera āsana-pīṭha rākhaha uṭhāñā
more prasāda deha' bhinna pātrete kariyā

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; āsana-pīṭha—the sitting place; rākhaha—keep aside; uthāñā—raising; more—unto Me; prasāda—prasāda; deha'-give; bhinna—separate; pātrete—on a plate; kariyā—putting.
translation: "Take away Kṛṣṇa's sitting place and put it aside. Then give me prasāda on a different plate."
